alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Berrien; Irwin; Tift; Turner (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 7:11PM EDT until August 06 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Irwin County in south central Georgia... Northern Berrien County in south central Georgia... Eastern Turner County in south central Georgia... Tift County in south central Georgia... Ben Hill County in south central Georgia... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 711 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Rochelle to Tifton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fitzgerald, Tifton, Ocilla, Enigma, Omega, Alapaha, Mystic, Unionville, Phillipsburg, Rebecca, Eldorado, Gladys, Osierfield, Glory, Harding, Waterloo, Pinetta, Ashton, Irwinville and Irwinville Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.

area.areaDesc: Ben Hill; Berrien; Irwin; Tift; Turner
